MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.30pm to carry out repairs on the overhead line network at Kersquarter Farm Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.07pm on Sunday 13th December 2020.
